bug.author: bsekachev
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>My actions before raising this issue</denchmark-h>
Read/searched the docs Searched past issues
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behaviour</denchmark-h>
Can see a user guide inside the tool <denchmark-h:h3>Current Behaviour</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40690378/97990864-9ccdf800-1df1-11eb-9b4e-63fb7f394bde.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Possible Solution</denchmark-h>
Probably related with code fixing by prettifier <denchmark-h:h3>Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)</denchmark-h>
Open User Guide
<denchmark-h:h3>Context</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
Git hash commit (git log -1): ef95288 Docker version docker version (e.g. Docker 17.0.05): Are you using Docker Swarm or Kubernetes? Operating System and version (e.g. Linux, Windows, MacOS): Code example or link to GitHub repo or gist to reproduce problem: Other diagnostic information / logs:

<denchmark-h:h3>Next steps</denchmark-h>
You may <denchmark-link:https://gitter.im/opencv-cvat/public>join our Gitter</denchmark-link> channel for community support.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/azhavoro>@azhavoro</denchmark-link> , the issue is quite critical. Could you please look at it with high priority?
